oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DIRECTIONAL RANDOM WAVES PROPAGATION ON BEACHES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Grassa, Jose Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: wave propagation
random waves
wave direction
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper deals with a method for the simulation of irregular, directional waves over large coastal areas using a linear model based on a energetically equalized discretization of wave spectrum and a parabolic approximation to the Berkhoff equation for wave evolution. A sensitivity analysis based on a comparison with physical model tests gives some ideas about the applicability of the method.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 22 (1990): Proceedings of 22nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Delft, The Netherlands, 1990.
